DOC.detailed_description: Autism serious brain disorder affect brain development often cause social educational problem . Prior study suggest gluten- casein-free diet may therapeutic effect behavior child autism . This study examine effect diet behavior child autism meet research diagnostic criterion , monitor adherence diet , receive similar intense behavioral therapy . Children study follow gluten free casein free diet 18 week . All subject 6 week baseline follow 12 week randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , challenge snack careful behavioral observation evaluation . They also receive uniform educational behavioral service provider . Standard autism evaluation method , weekly diet sleep diary schedule laboratory test use assess subject . An end study , follow-up assessment complete 30 week start study .
